siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Adjusting approach
frontmatter.description: The approach to the pandemic is changing over time, rather than as a response to new methods or protocols. It's a frustrating situation for everyone and the individual approaches will vary more widely moving forward.

frontmatter.title: Bigger strides
frontmatter.description: Utilize the time effectively by taking swings in areas that look like potential opportunities. Make the swings worthwhile, and go after the right opportunities.

frontmatter.title: Further than currently possible
frontmatter.description: Stretch beyond the boundaries currently in place. Overcome limitations with additional resources. Look further than the current conditions make readily apparent.

frontmatter.title: Trust that perceived problems are unintentional
frontmatter.description: Trust in people and be clear. Many problems are entirely unintentional and can be resolved with clear communication.

frontmatter.title: Make regular time to declutter mind
frontmatter.description: Make regular time to declutter mind. It's worth the time and having a regular time makes it easier to trust those distractions will be addressed.

frontmatter.title: Consider response to others actions
frontmatter.description: It's not possible to control others actions. It is possible to control the response to those actions.

frontmatter.title: Something good comes from all experiences
frontmatter.description: Something good comes from all experiences. Not looking for *everything* to be good because that's not true or realistic.

frontmatter.title: Trust in the future to find joy in the present
frontmatter.description: Trust in the future to find joy in the present. The future is steadily, continually approaching regardless of our actions.
